scripts.coverage: npm run clean && node_modules\.bin\nodetouch allFiredEvents && concurrently --names "GanacheCLI,Coverage" --kill-others "node_modules\.bin\testrpc-sc --port 8555 --gasPrice 0x01 --gasLimit 0xfffffffffff --allowUnlimitedContractSize" "node_modules\.bin\solidity-coverage" || true
scripts.build: npm test && mkdirp ./contracts/build && npm run generate
scripts.generate: npm run clean && mkdirp ./contracts/build && node ./compile_contract ./contracts/SupplyChainLogContract.sol ./contracts/build SupplyChain.BlockChain.SmartContracts false true
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run lint && node_modules\.bin\truffle test
